3.label: Leakage alarm
3.description: Sends notification in case of leackage

paramInformation.label: operation mode
paramInformation.description: 0 valve always off; 1 user absent/holiday; 2 user present; 3 valve always on

paramInformation.label: fixed schedule time - hours
paramInformation.description: fixed schedule time hour for microleakage test

paramInformation.label: fixed schedule time - minutes
paramInformation.description: fixed schedule time minute for microleakage test

paramInformation.label: fixed schedule day
paramInformation.description: fixed day in bin 1111111, Su=1, Sa=2, Fr=4, Th=8, We=16, Tu=32, Mo=64, 0= auto

paramInformation.label: automatic schedule time interval
paramInformation.description: automatic schedule time interval between microlekage tests, if not fixed

paramInformation.label: micro leakage mesuring time
paramInformation.description: micro leakage mesuring time, time of closed valve

paramInformation.label: micro leakage pressure drop
paramInformation.description: pressure drop for microleakage detection recognition

paramInformation.label: micro leakage pressure drop abort
paramInformation.description: pressure drop in kPa

paramInformation.label: number of measurements
paramInformation.description: how many in one time period

paramInformation.label: wait time until next measurement
paramInformation.description: waiting time in minutes between two meassurements

paramInformation.label: reaction to micro leakage
paramInformation.description: 0=disable detection, 1=blink LED, 2= blink LED andshut off valve

paramInformation.label: macro leakage detected
paramInformation.description: 0 = no leackage  1 = leakage

paramInformation.label: max flow rate if operation mode is 2
paramInformation.description: max flow rate if operation mode is 2

paramInformation.label: max pressure drop if operation mode is 2
paramInformation.description: max pressure drop if operation mode is 2

paramInformation.label: max liters if operation mode is 2
paramInformation.description: max liters  single water abstraction if operation mode is 2

paramInformation.label: max continuous liter if operation mode is 2
paramInformation.description: max liter continuous water abstraction if operation mode is 2

paramInformation.label: max time if operation mode is 2
paramInformation.description: max time of single water abstraction if operation mode is 2

paramInformation.label: max continious time if operation mode is 2
paramInformation.description: max time of continous water abstraction if operation mode is 2

paramInformation.label: max flow rate if operation mode is 1
paramInformation.description: max flow rate if operation mode is 1

paramInformation.label: max pressure drop if operation mode is 1
paramInformation.description: max pressure drop if operation mode is 1

paramInformation.label: max liters if operation mode is 1
paramInformation.description: max liters non continous water abstraction if operation mode is 1

paramInformation.label: max continuous liter if operation mode is 1
paramInformation.description: max liters continuous water abstraction if operation mode is 2

paramInformation.label: max time if operation mode is 1
paramInformation.description: max time of single water abstraction if operation mode is 1

paramInformation.label: max continuous time if operation mode is 1
paramInformation.description: max time of continous water abstraction if operation mode is 1

paramInformation.label: macro leakage deactivation time
paramInformation.description: temporary macro leakage deactivation (e.g. filling pool)

paramInformation.label: reaction to macro leakage
paramInformation.description: 0=disable detection, 1=blink LED, 2= blink LED and shut off valve

paramInformation.label: flooding sensor detected a leak
paramInformation.description: 0-no leakage, 1- flooding sensor detected leakage

paramInformation.label: reaction to flooding sensor
paramInformation.description: 0=disable detection, 1=blink LED, 2= blink LED and shut off valve

paramInformation.label: backup battery nominal voltage
paramInformation.description: Nominal voltage of backup battery

paramInformation.label: backup battery nominal capacity
paramInformation.description: Nominal capacity of backup battery

paramInformation.label: time set correctly
paramInformation.description: 1 = time is set correctly, 0 = time is not set correctly

paramInformation.label: total operating time
paramInformation.description: Counting total operation time internally

paramInformation.label: operating time since last power on
paramInformation.description: operating time since last power on

paramInformation.label: auto absent
paramInformation.description: 0 = disable, 1-168h time after no use, operation mode is changed to 1 (absent)

paramInformation.label: water temperature high threshold
paramInformation.description: water temperature high threshold for warning of sanitary problems

paramInformation.label: water temperature low threshold
paramInformation.description: water temperature low threshold for warning of risk of frost

paramInformation.label: water pressure high threshold
paramInformation.description: water pressure high threshold for warning of values above valid  operating cond.

paramInformation.label: water pressure low threshold
paramInformation.description: water pressure high threshold for warning of values below valid operating cond.

paramInformation.label: error code
paramInformation.description: error code to identify the reason of a warning or fault

paramInformation.label: autolearning
paramInformation.description: automatic adaption of limits, set ids 15-26 to learned values
